entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then clearing. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
